job_title: New College Grad - Industrial Engineer - Operations Improvement
job_description:
• Support and provide technical expertise for area management decision making (including queue time management, equipment and recipe releases, and general workstation optimization) Ensure availability and currency of documentation to enable all on call team members to support first-level investigation and resolution of IT ticket for OI system Bachelor's Degree required in Industrial Engineering, Integrated Manufacturing, Systems Engineering, Operations Research, Management Science or Computer Science Support and provide technical expertise for line management decision making (including linearity, cycle time, line yield, wafer starts and output optimization) The ability to utilize Industrial Engineering concepts (queueing theory, lean, theory of constraints, Little’s Law, scheduling, etc.
• Ensuring projects are properly prioritized and that deliverables and timelines are in line with constraint dates and business needs.
• Demonstrate basic programming skill with one of the following environment: SQL, Angular, C#, Java/JavaScript.
• Finishes the required safety training and ensures all work is conducted in accordance with safety policies New College Grad - Change Management EngineerManassas, Virginia, United States of AmericaPosted 7 days ago Ensure availability and accuracy of documentation to empower users to self-diagnose issues where possible.
• ) to implement solutions.
